name: Cowboys, Dinosaurs and Parkouring Cavemen from Mars
name_original: Cowboys, Dinosaurs and Parkouring Cavemen from Mars
description:
(UNFINISHED) a game decided entirely by random wheels, the stupidest combination of objects every concieved!

As mentioned, this game is nowhere near finished. It is missing a main menu, sounds, and cowboys haha. also only 3 levels, I planned to develop levels in the last few days and features in the first but i unexpectedly missed the last days of the jam.
